name: AIQUE VR
description:
AIQUE is a Pattern Recognition trainer where you match IQ-test-like shapes, with the intention of improving brain function . I make no scientific claims, this is purely a prototype to test out training methods in VR. 

The core components are basic VR interaction and a psuedo-random shape-generator, made in SideFX Houdini.

!![Only tested on Oculus Rift]!!

Everything is ultra bare bones now, but I would love to get your feedback.  If you find it interesting or useful in anyway, please consider supporting me with a donation or by spreading the word.

!!WARNING!!: The game has no end. There's is a ceiling for the complexity but not for the increase in speed. When you had enough, press Escape or throw of you headset.
